Truth or false? Luka Doncic will become the youngest MVP in NBA history.

In Staples Center today for Mavericks-Lakers. First live look at MVP candidate Luka Doncic this season. The 20-year-old is averaging 30.8 PTS, 9.9 REBS and 9.6 AST in 34.1 MIN while shooting 62.9% from 2 and 32.5% from 3 on 9.4 attempts per game. Also generating 9.8 FTs per game.
